thread.title: Variety Insight and ScriptNoted Launch Integrated Project Development Solution for Entertainment & Media
thread.title_full: Variety Insight and ScriptNoted Launch Integrated Project Development Solution for Entertainment & Media

author: Christopher Brenchley
title: Variety Insight and ScriptNoted Launch Integrated Project Development Solution for Entertainment & Media
text:
Variety Insight and ScriptNoted today announced an exclusive product integration partnership, focused on making Variety Insight’s up-to-the-minute industry data and analysis available through ScriptNoted’s cloud-based project development platform. Industry managers, producers and content creators; agencies and production companies; and studios that subscribe to both offerings may soon benefit from a centralized, data-rich and secure workflow management solution designed to help them better evaluate and develop script-based projects – for film, television, digital, or commercial.
“We are committed to making Variety’s paid industry data and analysis available wherever a compelling business application for it exists,” underscores Variety Insight president Mark Hoebich. “ScriptNoted provides us with an exciting new conduit, placing our film and television project insights seamlessly in the context of next-generation, cloud-based development workflow.”
A unique combination of contact management, secure online file sharing, and real-time feedback capture, ScriptNoted enables industry professionals to increase the security and control that they have over script-based project development. The mobile-responsive user experience greatly simplifies and scales their ability to keep track of and get feedback on works in progress, especially for projects that spend months or years in the development process.
“In the Entertainment & Media industry, perhaps more so than others, knowledge is power,” emphasizes Christopher Brenchley, ScriptNoted co-founder and CEO. “Enabling our subscribers to seamlessly access Variety Insight data and analysis to inform their development work has the potential to significantly enhance the productivity and ultimately, profitability, of their projects.”
Beginning in November 2015, ScriptNoted users will be able to connect to their Variety Insight accounts and access its database of industry contact information, project updates, and industry alerts directly from the ScriptNoted interface. ScriptNoted’s Variety Insight module will be made available to current Variety Insight customers at no additional charge, beyond the base ScriptNoted subscription fee.
ABOUT VARIETY INSIGHT
Variety Insight is the paid digital products arm of Variety. Variety Insight oversees its namesake flagship research & data solution, VarietyInsight.com, as well as the Variety Archives, and a familiarity and appeal metric, Vscore. Variety Insight was created when Variety acquired TVtracker, the leading research & data solution in the TV industry, in June 2011. Since that time Variety Insight has developed into the entertainment industry's premier data and analysis solution across TV, Film, and Digital.
Variety Insight is wholly owned by Penske Media Corporation (PMC), a leading digital media, publishing, and information services company founded in 2003. PMC engages with thriving audiences across the web, television, mobile, print and social media – reaching more than 140 million consumers monthly (comScore, 2014), and was recently named one of the Top 100 Private Companies in the United States & North America.
ABOUT SCRIPTNOTED
A unique combination of contact management, secure online file sharing and real-time feedback capture, ScriptNoted.com provides Entertainment & Media (E&M) industry managers, producers and creators; agencies and production companies; and studios with a cloud-based workflow management platform to better evaluate and develop script-based projects – for film, television, digital or commercial.
ScriptNoted is wholly owned by TSL Media, Inc., a privately held technology startup based in West Hollywood, CA, specializing in productivity solutions for the Entertainment & Media industry.
